text: Israel in the wilderness 1513 to 1473 B.C.E. – 40 years
479 years until the temple construction – 1 Kings 6:1
3.5 years of Jesus service, executed Nisan 14th, 33 C.E.
7 times – 2520 years to the Messianic Kingdom 1914 C.E. (Daniel 4:23)
First Missionary Journey of Paul, c. 47-48 C.E. with Barnabas and John Mark
Circumcision issue at Antioch, conference in Jerusalem c. 49 C.E.
Second Missionary Journey c. 49-52 C.E with Silas (Silvanus)
Paul in custody in Caesarea c. 56-58 C.E.
Paul’s first imprisonment in Rome c. 59-61 C.E.
Paul’s second imprisonment in Rome c. 65 C.E., 2 Timothy written, Paul executed
Galba, Otho and Vitellius (Year of the Four Emperors)
Exodus from Egypt on Nisan 14th, 1513 B.C.E.
Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria
Destruction of Jerusalem 607 B.C.E. by Babylon, 390 years after the division of the kingdom (Ezekiel 4:5)
Destruction of Jerusalem 70 C.E. by Rome under Titus
End of the time of the nations (Luke 21:24), God’s Kingdom starts to rule in heaven 1914 C.E.
Vulgate completed by Jerome (Latin translation of the bible) c. 405 C.E.
Greek text of Christian Greek Scriptures published by Desiderius Erasmus of Rotterdam 1516
Middle of week “sacrifice to cease” Daniel 9:27
Cornelius baptized at the end of 70 weeks (Daniel 9:24) in 36 C.E.
End of the pre-columbian period in the Americas 1492
Declaration of independence of 13 colonies in America 1776
Tischendorf discovers the Codex Sinaiticus from the 4th century in 1844
The first issue of “Zion’s Watch Tower and Herald of Christ’s Presence” is published in 1879
The “Photo-Drama of Creation” is first shown in New York on January 11, 1914
The Bible Students adopt a new name – Jehovah’s Witnesses (Isaiah 43:10, 12) in Columbus, Ohio, 1931
Watchtower Bible School of Gilead begins on Monday, February 1, 1943
“New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released in Manchester, England on June 18, 1960, reintroduces the name Jehovah in many parts of the Bible
The book “The Truth That Leads to Eternal Life” is released 1968
Start of JW.ORG with instructions in Kingdom Ministry December 2012
Revised “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released at annual meeting 2013, optimized to be used digitally and online
Start of JW Broadcasting® in October 2014
New format of midweek meeting with “Meeting Workbook” starting January 2016
This timeline is created in 2023, the hottest year in human history and the last 125,000 years
Leningrad Codex written in Cairo AD 1008
John writes “revelation” while exiled on Patmos 96-98 C.E.
The Buddha – Siddhartha Gautama c.563-c.483 B.C.E
Hijrah - Journey Mecca to Medina 16 July 622
1553 B.C.E. Moses has to escape Egypt – Exodus 2:15, Acts 7:23
Joseph sold as slave at the age of 17 – Gen 37:2
Cyrus the Great, Cambyses II, Darius I 490 BCE, Xerxes I 480 BCE (husband of Esther, Daniel 11:2)
Seleucus I Nicator (v5) Syria to Antiochus III (v10) and Seleucus IV (v18, 19) down to Octavian (v20) and Tiberius (v21-24)
Ptolemy I, II, III, IV (v11, 12), V (v15, 16) to the battle Actium 31 B.C.E.
British Empire 1870, Anglo-American World Power since 1914
Presence of Christ, Conclusion of the system of things (Matthew 24:3), the last days (2 Timothy 3:1)
King Suryavarman II builds Angkor Wat 1113-1150
Herodotus c. 484 – c. 425 BC, writes The Histories
Xia dynasty in China c. 2070 – c. 1600 BC
Anglo-American is symbolized by the feet of iron mixed with clay in the prophecy in Daniel 2:33, 41-43
Earth’s inhabitants are judged, separating sheep and goats (Matthew 25:31-33)
Gathering of Kingdom rulers (Matthew 24:31; 1 Corinthians 15:50-53; 1 Thessalonians 4:15-17)
A great crowd survives Armageddon (Revelation 7:9, 14; Psalm 37:9-11)
World population in billions in the last 2000 years
Holy Roman Empire – known as Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation after 1512
Largest city in the Americas, pyramids build c. 200 C.E.
Dionysius Exiguus, inventor of Anno Domini
Al-Azhar University is established in Cairo
Calculated beginning of Maya calendar August 11, 3114 B.C.E.
c. 2070 – c. 1600 BC; Era first alluded during the Western Zhou period
Joseph and Jacob reunited in Egypt – 1728 B.C.E. (Gen 45:11; 47:9)
King of the South from Daniel 11
King of the North from Daniel 11
